mapper.select: select a.seq, a.odStatus, a.odRegDateTime, a.odModDateTime, a.odDelNy, a.factory_seq, a.member_seq, a.grocery_seq from ordering as a where 1=1 ORDER BY a.seq desc
SELECT seq, odStatus, odDelNy, factory_seq, member_seq, grocery_seq FROM ordering WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ordering ( seq, odStatus, odRegDateTime, odDelNy, factory_seq, member_seq, grocery_seq ) values ( #{seq}, #{odStatus}, now(), #{odDelNy}, #{factory_seq}, #{member_seq}, #{grocery_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ordering SET odStatus = #{odStatus}, odModDateTime = now(), odDelNy = #{odDelNy}, factory_seq = #{factory_seq}, member_seq = #{member_seq}, grocery_seq = #{grocery_seq} WHERE seq = #{seq}
